Uses of Package
bomberman.core.logic

Packages that use bomberman.core.logic
bomberman.core.graphics   
bomberman.core.logic   
bomberman.core.logic.enemy   
bomberman.core.logic.powerUp   
 

Classes in bomberman.core.logic used by bomberman.core.graphics
Block
          The Block class defines an abstract piece of world's ground.
Bomb
          The Bomb class defines the logic structure of a bomb.
Bomber
          The Bomber class defines the logic structure of the BomberMan character.
Direction
          The Enumeration of the allowed spatial directions in the game.
DynamicPhysicsEntity
          The subclass of Entity that handles interactions with the Box2d physics engine and updates the state of the entity as time passes.
Entity
          The Entity class represent a base class of logic objects acting in a LogicWorld.
FireEntity
          The FireEntity class represents the flame that comes up with the explosion produced by a Bomb.
LogicWorld
          The class responsible for managing all logic game-related aspects during a single round of game play.
PhysicsEntity
          An interface for entities that have an associated Body for modeling their physical interactions.
PhysicsEntity.HasContactListener
          A marker interface for whether this physics entity listens for contact with other entities.

          The Coordinate class represents a tuple of integer x,y coordinates.

          The MoveStrategy interface provides base methods to define the class of autonomous movement strategies for Enemy and DynamicPhysicsEntity instances.

ScoreManager
          The ScoreManager class manages the player's score during the game.
State
          The State enum represents the states that an Entity can assume.
WallBlock
          The WallBlock class extends the Block class.
